abstract: Dominique Martinet and Andre Simonpietri Jr, whose 2006 wedding was featured in the New York Times Vows column, describe the ups and downs of their marriage.
snippet: More than five years later, Dominique Martinet, 67, and André Simonpietri Jr., 69, get along fine despite being “set in our ways.”
lead_paragraph: More than five years later, Dominique Martinet, 67, and André Simonpietri Jr., 69, get along fine despite being “set in our ways.”

headline.main: Set in Their Ways, but Still Very Flexible
headline.print_headline: Set in Their Ways, But Still Very Flexible
headline.seo: Dominique Martinet, André Simonpietri Jr. - State of the Unions
